Footer.description: Official representative for sales and after-sales services of Baume & Mercier, Rado, Gucci, Balmain, Tissot, Certina, Hamilton, Mido, Calvin Klein, Victorinox, Swarovski, Wenger, Swatch, and Flik Flak watches, as well as Swarovski jewelry and crystals, Victorinox multi-tools, knives, kitchenware, and travel equipment with over a quarter-century of experience.

automatic_watches.title: Automatic Watches
automatic_watches.description: Automatic watches, also known as self-winding watches, are mechanical timepieces that use the motion of the wearer's wrist to wind the mainspring, eliminating the need for manual winding. They are popular among watch enthusiasts for their craftsmanship, precision, and traditional watchmaking heritage.

smart_watches.title: Smart Watches
smart_watches.description: Smartwatches are advanced wearable devices that offer more than just timekeeping. They feature fitness tracking, notifications, GPS, and app integration. Many models support calling and messaging, making them a convenient companion for everyday life.

skeleton_watches.title: Skeleton Watches
skeleton_watches.description: Skeleton watches showcase the intricate mechanical movement by removing unnecessary parts of the dial. The transparent design allows enthusiasts to admire the craftsmanship and inner workings of the timepiece.

chronograph_watches.title: Chronograph Watches
chronograph_watches.description: Chronograph watches function as a stopwatch combined with a display watch. They are popular among sports enthusiasts and professionals who require precise time measurement. Many models come with tachymeters for speed calculations.

fast_shipping.title: Fast Shipping
fast_shipping.description: Quick delivery to all parts of the country.

authenticity_guarantee.title: Authenticity Guarantee
authenticity_guarantee.description: All products are sold with a guarantee of authenticity.

support_24_7.title: 24/7 Support
support_24_7.description: Online support to help with your questions and issues.

review_1.name: Ali Rezaei
review_1.review: The product quality was excellent. Thank you for your great store!

review_2.name: Mahsa Ahmadi
review_2.review: Fast shipping and good packaging. I will definitely buy again.

review_3.name: Mohammad Javadi
review_3.review: Authentic and high-quality products. Had a great shopping experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Ninja Watch Gallery, we believe a watch is more than just a tool to tell time. It is a symbol of style, personality, and even heritage. Our goal is to offer a collection that suits all tastes and provides a delightful online shopping experience for you.

quality.title: Unmatched Quality
quality.description: All watches are original and from reputable global brands.

variety.title: Wide Variety
variety.description: From formal and sporty to digital, everything is available for you.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our team is always here to ensure you have a great shopping experience.

brand_story.title: Our Story
brand_story.description: Ninja Watch Gallery started its journey in 1999 with the aim of bridging fashion, technology, and innovation. Over time, we have earned the trust of thousands of customers and today, we are proud to be one of the leading online watch retailers.
brand_story.additional_info: By focusing on customer needs, our team continuously updates products and services to provide an experience beyond expectations.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or need assistance, we are always here for you.

contact_info.title: Contact Information
